page.title: 10Burford Local News 31-5-85
page.content: Witney Club faces D-Day Next Week The Football Club at Witney are in financial difficulties and their future is uncertain. Schools need cash life-line, warning Many pupils in County schools are coping with out-of-date books and are having to share text-books,they are also having to use old fashioned equipment. A Year of hard work equals one Quilt Local women have put a year's hard work into making a quilt which will be given to the Witney Community Hospital. Storms bring road chaos and floods People were injured on the A40 because of bad road conditions. Final bid to get by-pass There are hopes for a by-pass for Burford in 1987. Church opens again .Burford Methodists open their renovated Church again.
